alert.note: Alert for Andrew; Holt; Nodaway (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 04 at 6:25PM CDT until April 05 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 700 PM CDT FOR EASTERN HOLT...SOUTHERN NODAWAY AND NORTHWESTERN ANDREW COUNTIES... At 625 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Oregon, or 10 miles southeast of Mound City, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Law enforcement. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Maryville, Oregon, Ravenwood, Maitland, Skidmore, Forest City, Fillmore, Barnard, Graham, Arkoe and Quitman. This includes Interstate 29 between mile markers 67 and 81. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
